LanguageData.Ranged_Crossbow.label: light crossbow
LanguageData.Ranged_Crossbow.description: Relatively simple and cheap, light crossbows deal greater damage than regular bows, in exchange for longer reloading time and shorter range.
LanguageData.Arrow_Crossbow.label: light crossbow arrow
LanguageData.Flame_Crossbow.label: light crossbow(flaming arrow)
LanguageData.Flame_Crossbow.description: Relatively simple and cheap, light crossbows deal greater damage than regular bows, in exchange for longer reloading time and shorter range. Crossbow can be used to set fire as well.
LanguageData.FlameArrow_Crossbow.label: flaming light crossbow arrow
LanguageData.Ranged_Arbalest.label: Arbalest
LanguageData.Ranged_Arbalest.description: Stronger and more powerful, these deadly weapons are nightmare for those who aren't fully armed.
LanguageData.Arrow_Arbalest.label: arbalest arrow
LanguageData.Flame_Arbalest.label: arbalest(flaming arrow)
LanguageData.Flame_Arbalest.description: Stronger and more powerful, these deadly weapons are nightmare for those who aren't fully armed. Arbalests are even more dangerous if shooting flaming arrows.
LanguageData.FlameArrow_Arbalest.label: flaming arbalest arrow
LanguageData.Ranged_Waistcrossbow.label: waist-stretched crossbow
LanguageData.Ranged_Waistcrossbow.description: A kind of crossbow that requires user to fully stetched out on the ground when reloading. Really powerful, but far from rapid.
LanguageData.Arrow_Waistcrossbow.label: waist-stretched crossbow arrow
LanguageData.Ranged_Repeatingcrossbow.label: repeating crossbow
LanguageData.Ranged_Repeatingcrossbow.description: Repeating crossbow, or Chu-Ko-Nu, a kind of crossbow that can be fired in a burst, while doesn't really as powerful as other crossbows.
LanguageData.Arrow_Repeatingcrossbow.label: repeating crossbow arrow
